job.title: System Engineer

User Support and Development- Two parts: Scripting automations and answering user ticket2. Tickets can range from automation requests to assisting with O365 access. Experience:1. O3652. Active Directory Nice to Have:OKTAGoogle WorkspaceMicrosoft TechnologiesWorking in Active Directory Tools and Programs:O365 – Suite of Microsoft applications – Outlook, Excel, Word, etc.PowerShell Language for automation – ScriptingActive Directory Experience . If you are interested, please share a good time and your number for a short discussion. Alternatively, you could share your updated resume at anosh.kumar@bayonesolutions.com or call me at (925) 218-2347. Looking forward to hearing from you!
